ygData.subject: Re: Banded Armor vs Chainmail
ygData.msgSnippet: On Fennin (at least where I am) the Banded Arms are 12PP; Tunic 20PP; Helm 10PP...I don t know other prices but would like to learn what they are on other
ygData.messageBody:
On Fennin (at least where I am) the Banded Arms are 12PP; Tunic 20PP; Helm 10PP...I don't know other prices but would like to learn what they are on other servers


> ** Original Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Banded Armor vs Chainmail
> ** Original Sender: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
> ** Original Date: Mon, 17 May 1999 23:24:46 PDT

> ** Original Message follows...

>
> From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>
>
> First piece you should get are the bracers. Price should be 5pp.
> Anything else is a rippoff or a good deal.
> The other pices range from 12pp to 8pp
> Tunics and cloaks? It hink are the most expensive parts.
>
>
> Oh I got a question.....Is banded the best armor a smith can make?
>
> Vashi
>
>
> >From: suzkim@...
> >

> >
